snippet.title: The Swords - Trailer
snippet.description:
The Swords is an action game of ancient martial arts. It tells the story of a sword master's life and his deep immersion in the art of swords. Amidst the ink wash painting is the light and shade of swords, which embodies the fighting and pursuit of a sword master.

App Store: https://itunes.apple.com/app/id924826403
Google Play: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.sunheadgames.swords

Developed by Sunhead Games: http://sunheadgames.com/swords
Twitter: http://www.twitter.com/sunheadgames
Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/sunheadgames
Music by Zoetrope International: http://www.zoetropetw.com

◆

《說劍》是一款武俠動作遊戲，講述一名劍客畢生浸淫劍學的故事。
在水墨化成的刀光劍影之中，體現武者相鬥之勢。

App Store 下載：https://itunes.apple.com/tw/app/id924826403?l=zh
Google Play 下載：https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.sunheadgames.swords

日頭遊戲製作：http://sunheadgames.com/swords
音樂授權自愚人夢想開發有限公司：http://www.zoetropetw.com/
Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/sunheadgames
Twitter: http://www.twitter.com/sunheadgames
